::DarkMouse::

She jumped back a few feet as Starscream came up and grabbed the 
papers. "AHHH!"  She stood there, with her back pressed against the 
wall as she looked up at Starscream. "Meg....ah..Megatron is dead." 
Her body trembled as she kept her eyes fixed on him.  "I..I saw on 
the monitor...you...you have his spark.. he is dead then."




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Starscream
> 
> Starscream had been keeping guard at the entrance, and he saw 
> Arachnia walk up. KitKat came and started acting all friendly, the 
> thing a leader should do when welcoming a gues. He heard the order 
> she gave to Destructor about the bot he had captured. He whispered 
> into KitKat's ear.
> 
> "I don't like this. She's going to do something."
> 
> He looked to Inferno.
> 
> "I'll go. You should be here, since it;s your base."
> 
> Starscream waled to the lab and saw the small bot reading some 
papers.
> 
> "Alright! What are you doing? Who gave you the permission to look 
at 
> those. They are classified!" He said, ripping them out of her 
> hand, "Now, we've got some questions. The most importantly, where 
is 
> Megatron?"
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Trainers
> 
> Prebon had been watching Koj appraoch, and easily dodged his stars. 
> He laughed at him, thinking how foolish it is to attack all of the 
> Trainers by himself. Him, Ignatius, Bullet and Savage flew up into 
> the air and surrounded him. Prebon was infront of him, Bullet 
behind, 
> Ignatius below and Savage on top. Prebon laughed.
> 
> "So you have seen us. Big mistake. You removed our chip. What a bad 
> thing for you to do. You could have had a great lifestyle with us 
> Koj, you have much potential. When the chip entered your spark, I 
> learned much about you Koj. I know about Lilly and Soundwave. I 
also 
> know that you have something to do in the afterlife. Well tonight 
is 
> the night Koj. Your wish will come true. Say hello to Lilly for me!"
> 
> Prebon jammed his lance right into Koj's throat. Bullet fired two 
> missles at the back of him. Ignatius fired two feather explosives
> (Kind of like grenades. They are feathers, and 10 seconds after 
they 
> attach they explode) and Savage blew two fireballs onto Koj's head.
